titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the prizes of poultry, rabbits, butter, candles, charcoale, and all manner of fuell of vvood.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: The dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 24; Steele notation: Walker, (in italics) person 2) iiij.d. 3) vij.d. obserued,.
Dated at end: ... VVhitehall, this twelfh day of February in the ninth yeere of Our raigne ...
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
